subject: Re: Order #SSN4270 confirmed
description_text:

conversations.body_text: Hi Jörgen Nilsson,    We apologize, but the pedals are currently out of stock at our German warehouse. They are expected to arrive tomorrow. Once restocked, we will ship them to you via DHL.

Hi again
I still haven't got any update if my order is sent.
Will i get my order delivered to me before xmas?

/ Jorgen


Den mån 8 dec. 2025 10:53service@simsonn.com

Hi

*When will my order #SSN4270 be sent to me?*
It was confirmed 1 Decemeber 1.
December 8 you answered me that you get in in stock the next day.
I still haven't even gotten the tracking number.

/ Jorgen

Den mån 1 dec. 2025 kl 21:11 skrev SIMSONN

Hi Jörgen Nilsson,    We apologize for the delayed response. Your order was scheduled for shipment from our German warehouse, but due to shipping delays, the goods arrived later than expected. They have now arrived at the warehouse, and we have sent you a shipping notification.
